item.title: How to hide your Posterous profile
item.description: I’m not claiming this makes your Posterous anonymous at all, but if you would like to hide your profile information from being displayed on your Posterous site/blog/whatever: Go to “Manage” Go to “Theme my site” Click on “Advanced” and name your new template Expand the editor using the link on the right Remove everything from and including <sectionÂ id=“profile”> up to and including the relevant occurrence of Repeat for other sections if you want to remove contributor lists etc.
